cause.description:
--------------------PLEASE JOIN----------------------- If....... - You love kittens - You DO NOT want to see kittens (or any other animals) abused - You Want to help The Humane Society - And join this cause and please donate because thousands and thousands of kittens are being abused each day so please, join , donate and make a difference.
1. Kittens
2. stop kitten abuse
3. Abuse
cause.mission: Save Kittens all around The World
cause.name: Stop Kitten Abuse
